trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" /> objects, which deliberately have no type conversion pathways.
trans-unit.target: Implementa um conversor de tipo para objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" />, que não têm deliberadamente nenhum caminho de conversão de tipo.

trans-unit.source: The type converter enforces and reports that behavior.
trans-unit.target: O conversor de tipo impõe e relata esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> tipo não deve usar um caminho de conversor de tipo para converter valores.

trans-unit.source: You should use markup extensions instead.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar extensões de marcação.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Por esse motivo, o <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> e <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> métodos sempre retornam `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> e <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> métodos sempre geram uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The exceptions might possibly report invalid input, but even input that is considered valid will result in <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: As exceções podem possivelmente entrada inválida de relatório, mas mesmo entrada é considerada válida resultará em <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto de formato que fornece informações sobre o ambiente do qual este conversor está sendo invocado.

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: O tipo que está sendo avaliado para conversão.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto do tipo especificado pode ser convertido em uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" />, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> tipo não deve usar um caminho de conversor de tipo para converter valores (deve usar extensões de marcação em vez disso).

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Por esse motivo, o <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> e <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> métodos sempre retornam `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> e <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> métodos sempre geram uma exceção.
